localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Tag your time, get the insight.
nodes.title: TimeTagger - Open source time tracker
nodes.author: Almar Klein

nodes.excerpt: Open-source team collaboration tool with unique topic-based threading that combines the best of email and chat to make remote work productive and delightful. Fortune 500 companies, leading open source projects, and 1000s of other organizations use Zulip.
nodes.title: Zulip 4.0 - Open source team chat with powerful threading
nodes.author: Tim Abbott

nodes.excerpt: A Python package to copy all your Kindle highlights and notes to a database in Notion. Plug in your Kindle device to your PC to run this script. Requires Python 3.9+ installed on your system.
nodes.title: Kindle2Notion - Export your Kindle clippings to a Notion database
nodes.author: Jeffrey Jacob

nodes.excerpt: Open up your Notion workspace to your favorite apps and take your productivity to the moon. With n8n's Notion node, you will be able to sync data between Notion and other apps. While you are at it, why not build your own products with Notion and n8n?
nodes.title: Notion n8n Integration - Connect your Notion workspace to your favorite apps
nodes.author: Jan Oberhauser

nodes.excerpt: Recast by Amplication is an open-source tool that generates TypeScript Node.js backend and a React client based on Excel schema. It includes a GraphQL and REST API, identity management, logging utility, error handler, and a React admin UI.
nodes.title: Recast by Amplication - Convert Excel Sheet to a TypeScript Node.js API
nodes.author: Yuval Hazaz

nodes.excerpt: Iconoir is a constantly evolving open-source SVG icons library with more than 900 icons. No premium icons, no email sign-up, no newsletters.
nodes.title: Iconoir - A diverse and open-source library with 900+ icons
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Release features with confidence; manage feature flags across web, mobile, and server side applications. Use our hosted API, deploy to your own private cloud, or run on-premises
nodes.title: Flagsmith - Feature flag, remote config and AB testing platform
nodes.author: Ben Rometsch

nodes.excerpt: Refined Zapier is a free open source browser extension to improve the user experience of Zapier. We've enhanced styling, search, and navigation to help power users move faster and stay organized.
nodes.title: Refined Zapier - Open-source browser extension to improve Zapier's UX
nodes.author: Zach Waterfield

nodes.excerpt: Mars26 is an open source Mars map in high-resolution, natural color. Built on top of previous CTX & Viking satellite photography, merged into an interactive map with full coverage. Zoom in, explore and place tweets at your favorite Mars locations.
nodes.title: Mars26 - Open source, high resolution, natural color Mars map
nodes.author: Spacep

nodes.excerpt: Talk is a free & open-source video conference app for the web. Works in all major browsers. No signups. No downloads. 100% peer-to-peer.
nodes.title: Talk - A free & open-source group video call thats works in browser
nodes.author: Î½Î±Ñ•Î±nÑ‚Ğ½.Î½

nodes.excerpt: Iconduck is a collection of 146 (and counting) open source icon and illustration sets. â € They can be searched through and downloaded, and are available for personal and commercial purposes (depending on the license, some may request a backlink).
nodes.title: Iconduck - 113,524 free open source icons & illustrations
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Calendso is the open source Calendly alternative. Self host it, or have it hosted by us. Integrate it seamlessly into your business with advanced customization and the open API. White-label by default, and designed to be a joy to use for you and your visitors.
nodes.title: Calendso - The open source Calendly alternative
nodes.author: Bailey Pumfleet

nodes.excerpt: Verifying user identities requires writing tedious, repetitive code, risking catastrophic security breaches ğŸ˜±. With NoPass.me, an open-source MFA verification solution, securely send and verify One-Time Passwords and ensure users are who they say they are!
nodes.title: NoPass.me - Open-source identity verification
nodes.author: Nicolas GreniÃ©

nodes.excerpt: Breathly is a 100% free mobile app that helps you focus on your breathing. Use Breathly for daily relaxation and breath training: just choose a breathing technique and focus on the guided exercise. Breathly is free, with no trackers and no in-app purchases.
nodes.title: Breathly - Open-source breath training and relaxation app
nodes.author: Matteo Mazzarolo

nodes.excerpt: Supabase is an open source Firebase alternative. Today we are launching one of our most requested features - Storage! You can upload files, programmatically or via the dashboard, and make them available in your Supabase app.
nodes.title: Supabase Storage - Store and serve any type of digital content
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Developers have been using the Grouparoo UI to set up automated data movement from their databases to cloud-based tools like Mailchimp. Grouparoo now supports declarative code to set up this pipeline so you manage data sync just like you would any other app.
nodes.title: Grouparoo 2.0 - Integrate with marketing tools using low-code configuration
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: Compose private notes, optionally share them with others and still stay in control of who can access your data. All while having an excellent offline-first experience on all platforms.
nodes.title: Serenity Notes - End-to-end encrypted collaborative notes app
nodes.author: Moritz Plassnig

nodes.excerpt: Porter is a platform that makes AWS/GCP as easy to use as Heroku. With instant deploys from Git, built-in autoscaling, and automatic SSL, Porter gives you the convenience of a PaaS while preserving flexibility and control.
nodes.title: Porter - Heroku that runs in your own cloud
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Start creating your app with clean mind and clear representing of screen structure. There are 12 device mockups in the pack, for both iPhone and Android. Carefully created A4 format templates that perfectly repeat the real device sizes. PNG, JPG, PDF formats.
nodes.title: Printables - Free printable templates for your mobile sketching
nodes.author: Vitaly Belousov

nodes.excerpt: Instantly find the "best fit" VC funds for your startup. OpenVC lets you browse 2,200+ funds by investment criteria. In return, VCs receive less spam and more qualified deal flow. Let's build an open way into VC!
nodes.title: OpenVC - 2200+ VC firms by thesis to find 'best fit' for your startup
nodes.author: Steph Nass

nodes.excerpt: Webiny is an open-source framework that helps developers architect, build and deploy applications on top of the serverless infrastructure. Webiny also comes with a serverless CMS that runs on top of AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, and S3.
nodes.title: Webiny 5.0 - Build serverless applications and websites in minutes
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Formst is a JavaScript library for structuring and validating forms in React. It is based on MobX-State-Tree which makes it simple and performant and it is built on the principles of "UI as an afterthought".
nodes.title: Formst - Model-driven form library for React
nodes.author: Gaurav Guha

nodes.excerpt: Amplication is an open source development tool. It helps you develop quality Node.js applications without spending time on repetitive coding tasks.
nodes.title: Amplication - Instantly generate Node.js apps with GraphQL and REST API
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: Devcover is an open-source application that allows developers to create and deploy their portfolio in less than 5 minutes with just their username. Features - Good designed - Google Analytics support - SEO friendly - Mobile friendly - Fully customizable - High performance - Availability to be hired - And much more...
nodes.title: Devcover - Easiest way to generate a developer portfolio
nodes.author: Junior Garcia

nodes.excerpt: Lullaby helps treat Tinnitus, a condition that makes you hear a very annoying sound for the rest of your life. Most of the ENTs I checked with seemed poorly prepared to help their patients with the stress, so the app teaches you a healthy way to do that.
nodes.title: Lullaby - Helps you treat Tinnitus, a chronic health condition
nodes.author: Roberto GonzÃ¡lez

nodes.excerpt: Web Analytics made simple and therefore privacy friendly. No Cookies. No logging. No IP address fingerprinting. We don't collect personal data, which allows serving many users with little hosting costs. The source code is published under the AGPLâ€‘v3 licence.
nodes.title: Counter - Simple and free web analytics
nodes.author: Bogdan Slomchinskiy

nodes.excerpt: Our next generation of Flutter, built for web, mobile, and desktop Today, Google's announcing Flutter 2: a major upgrade to Flutter that enables developers to create beautiful, fast, and portable apps for any platform.
nodes.title: Flutter 2.0 - Build beautiful native apps in record time, now on web too
nodes.author: Eduardo M

nodes.excerpt: A small app for making quick flowcharts from text â¿».
nodes.title: flowchart.fun - An open-source tool for generating flowcharts from text
nodes.author: Mehmet Akyol

nodes.excerpt: Sprint Poker is an intuitive, lightweight estimation tool that fits into your existing Jira workflow. ğŸ—³ï¸ Estimates that sync back to Jira automagically ğŸƒ Interactive cards and custom estimation scales â° Async friendly for distributed teams
nodes.title: Sprint Poker by Parabol - Remotely bring planning poker to life
nodes.author: Jordan Husney

nodes.excerpt: Athens is an open-source and local-first alternative to Roam Research. Athens is the most powerful and transparent knowledge graph.
nodes.title: Athens Research - Open-source, local-first Roam Research
nodes.author: Jeff Tang

nodes.excerpt: Global.health is a collaborative effort by technologists and researchers from leading international institutions to build a trusted, detailed, and accurate resource of real-time infectious disease data.
nodes.title: Global.health - Access data about 5M+ anonymized COVID-19 cases
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Use the tools you know. Respect users' privacy. Forget cookie consents. Comply with GDPR, ePrivacy, COPPA, CalOPPA, PECR, PIPEDA, CASL; you name it.
nodes.title: Privera - Privacy-first, ethical and cookieless Google Analytics
nodes.author: Farzad Senart

nodes.excerpt: SigNoz is an open-source alternative to DataDog. We help developers find issues in the software they run on cloud and solve them quickly. Run SigNoz in your infrastructure and get your application monitoring setup at 10x lower cost
nodes.title: SigNoz - Open source alternative to Datadog
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Hasura helps developers and organisations build and ship modern applications & APIs faster by making data instantly accessible over a realtime GraphQL & REST APIs.
nodes.title: Hasura GraphQL Engine 2.0 - Instant realtime GraphQL for all your data
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Chatwoot is an open-source omnichannel communication platform built as an alternative to Intercom, Zendesk etc. Chatwoot helps you to connect email, website live chat, social media handles, WhatsApp etc. and manage all your customer interactions from one place.
nodes.title: Chatwoot - Open-source customer communication platform
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: React Native ARIA provides a set of React hooks that handles behaviour, accessibility and interactions so you can implement custom components and design systems for Android, iOS and Web.
nodes.title: React Native ARIA - React Hooks to make accessible React Native design systems
nodes.author: Gaurav Guha

nodes.excerpt: SST (Serverless Stack) is a framework that makes it easy to build serverless apps. It features: -- - A Live Lambda Development environment - Zero-config support for ES and TypeScript - Higher-level constructs designed for serverless
nodes.title: SST - Work on your serverless apps live
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Decentraland is a decentralized virtual reality platform powered by the Ethereum blockchain. Within the Decentraland platform, users can create, experience, and monetize their content and applications.
nodes.title: Decentraland 2.0 - Explore a virtual world owned by its users
nodes.author: Sam Drozdov

nodes.excerpt: Papercups is an open-source live customer chat app written in Elixir. We are a dev friendly alternative to Intercom and Drift that is highly extensible and customizable. We also have a Slack integration that lets you reply from Slack.
nodes.title: Papercups 2.0 - Open source Intercom and Drift alternative
nodes.author: Kam Leung

nodes.excerpt: Our serverless Kubernetes platform is designed for the needs of fast moving development teams who want to focus on delivering applications, not operations.
nodes.title: CTO.ai 2.0 - A smarter workflow for Cloud Native apps
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: ğŸ Jam is an open source implementation of audio spaces (think: Clubhouse, Twitter Spaces, Orbit, â€¦). Jam lets you can create rooms that can be used for panel discussions, jam sessions, free flowing conversations, debates, theatre plays, musicals and more.
nodes.title: Jam - Your own version of Clubhouse for mini conferences & friends
nodes.author: Thomas Schranz â›„ï¸

The app is entirely free and powered by an open-source community. â €â €â €â €â €â €â €â €â € Works with 30+ meeting services.
nodes.title: MeetingBar 3.0 - Meetings before your eyes
nodes.author: Andrii Leitisus

nodes.excerpt: Powered by tens of thousands of popular fully responsive visuals, SYQEL VJ is a simple to use desktop application that enables users to instantly visualize their mic or desktop audio feeds & easily use it as a window source in OBS or other broadcasting apps.
nodes.title: SYQEL VJ - Automatic responsive visuals for your streams
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Pika (pronounced piÂ·kuh, like picker) is an easy to use, open-source, native colour picker for macOS. Pika makes it simple to quickly find colours on screen, in the format you need, so you can get on with being a speedy, successful designer.
nodes.title: Pika - An open-source colour picker app for macOS
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: It's been a long 2020, eh? ğŸ¥µ Sometimes, thanking someone for going above and beyond their ways to help you is not enough. Send them a "kudos" in a public Slack channel to share their awesomeness with everyone and spread a bit of positivity. ğŸš€

nodes.excerpt: For me, as a developer, finding an interesting idea to work on has always been challenging. If you are stuck at the idea stage, subscribe to the IdeasFor.dev newsletter to receive weekly project ideas in your inbox.
nodes.title: Ideas for dev - New ideas for your next project
nodes.author: Saeed Moqadam

nodes.excerpt: Volt React Dashboard is a free and open-source admin interface and UI library powered by React.js and Bootstrap 5. Special PH offer: use the code AWESOMEREACT25 when checking out to get a 25% price reduction for the https://themesberg.com/product/dashboard/volt-pro-react!
nodes.title: Volt React - Open source React.js & Bootstrap 5 admin dashboard interface
nodes.author: SzÅ‘gyÃ©nyi ZoltÃ¡n

nodes.excerpt: Firefox Relay makes it easy to create aliases, randomly generated email addresses that forward to your real inbox. Use it to protect your online accounts - and your identity - from hackers.
nodes.title: Firefox Relay - Hide your real email address to help protect your identity.
nodes.author: qztn

nodes.excerpt: Websu.io helps you optimize your web applications for speed by generating detailed speed reports. The speed reports are run using Chrome and show you how you can optimize your web application to improve the performance.
nodes.title: Websu - Open source website speed, optimization & monitoring service
nodes.author: Sam Stoelinga

nodes.excerpt: ğŸ´ Flagpack is an open source project of 260+ stunning flag icons for your digital product. Easily implementable in your design or code project. Download for Figma, Sketch and Adobe XD (coming soon) or install for React, Vue or Angular (coming soon).

nodes.title: Sponsorware for Github - Sell access to Github repositories with Github Sponsors.
nodes.author: Jim Bisenius
